projectStart

Class IndexServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • projectStart.IndexServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/IndexServlet")
public class IndexServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    IndexServlet initializes all the data structures, forms initial clusters, gets required metrics from Google API and finally forms the routes.
    Author:
    Abhishek Joshi, Anand Tirthgirikar, Sandesh Prabhu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
